create.title: Tell employer something about yourself!
create.previewBtnTooltip: Go to preview page, where you can download your resume

clearModalConfirm: Please confirm clearing all form data

main.title: Create your resume!
main.subtitle: Easy and free
main.text:
Searching for a job is not an easy process and Build-resume has been created to simplify at least one part of the game.

The idea for the project came as a result of a personal frustration with the modern 'free resume' services. To say they were a huge disappointment to me is to say nothing. Tired of spending time and energy to get me nowhere, I decided to create a web app for personal use.

After the first resume has been created and sent out, I decided to share this app with the world.

step1.text:
You choose the template
It can be changed before downloading or at any other time without losing entered data.

step2.text:
You fill the fields
you need.
step2.warn: * Incomplete fields will not appear in the final document

step3.text:
Seems like you're all set up!
And we don't lie. We won't ask for paid subscription or registration or whatever else before the download

safe.title: Safety
safe.subtitle: You can't steel a thing that doesn't exist
safe.text:
Build-resume.io doesn't have any data-base, we don't use cookie and do not save any data on our side in any possible way. All of the data filled, stays only in your browser.

You can't go any safer than that
